name: The 35th Tri-Annual Blitheport Harvest Day Jamboree
name_original: The 35th Tri-Annual Blitheport Harvest Day Jamboree
description:
An appetite for victory!

The 35th Tri-Annual Blitheport Harvest Day Jamboree is in full swing, and the atmosphere is electric! Like waves upon rough seas, raucous cheers crash over the Hungry Pumkin and his friends as they find themselves locked in a fierce, cutthroat competition to determine who among them is the Harvest Day Weigh-in Champion!

Select your favorite of four colorful characters and compete in three exciting events! Can you smash, bash, and crash your way into the winner's circle?

Hotfix

Hotfix version resolves an issue with the game failing to advance to the third minigame.

Menu Controls
  • MOVE with WASD or the arrow keys
  • SELECT with SPACEBAR or LEFT MOUSE
  • (WEB ONLY) CHANGE VOLUME with 1/2 keys
The Limestock Fishing Company's third production:
  • Blorengerhymes (Graphics)
  • Jsburg (Programming)
  • Karmelyth (Programming)
  • Redo (Programming, SFX)
  • RENREN (Music)
  • Zein (Music)
Voice talent:
  • Blorengerhymes (The Hungry Pumkin)
  • Jon (The Vicious Squash)
  • Jsburg (The Intelligent Tomato)
  • Redo (Announcer; The Incredulous Eggplant)
Special thanks:
  • Saniblues
  • Yokin

Soundtrack available on Bandcamp.
